resources.string: Friendlier needs permission to access your coarse location (within ~2km) via cell towers and wifi. Location is updated when you open the app and stored as lat/long coordinates. Your location is only used to find other nearby users, a history is not stored, and you can delete the information at any time from the \'privacy\' page.
Friendlier needs permission to access the storage on your device to allow you to pick photos.
Friendlier requires that you be signed in to use the app\'s functions. You can sign in via the Google account on your phone, or an email.
Looks like you aren\'t signed in. Click the Sign In button to use the Google account on your phone. At the current time this is the only option for sign-in.
